about_the_game:
Relax and enjoy a magical journey through black and white drawings bursting with wonder and brimming with animations. Search for hidden items, wander through the charming storybook setting, and stumble across a symphony of songful surprises.

With Ava's special pencil, drawings spring to life. You can twang trees, break rocks, poke goblins, and create your own musical tunes.



Rhyming Clues
The hidden objects are shown in small circles at the bottom of the screen. Hover over each circle to see a rhyming clue about where the item will be. There is a Special Object in each drawing, find it to open a portal that transports you to the following scene.

Kind Level Progression
Uncover new ways to engage with each drawing as you progress through the levels. No need to worry about getting stuck—your Friendly Hint Orb is here to help! Collect enough items, and the Friendly Hint Orb will guide you to the Special Object, allowing you to move on to the next level.

Visual & Audio ASMR
Delight in meticulously crafted illustrations that offer smooth, calming interactions. Experience a collection of soothing sounds, including soft whispers, tingling taps, and serene ambient melodies.

Features:

  • Beautiful hand-drawn themed worlds
  • Over 100+ hidden objects with charming animations
  • Over 1000+ hand-crafted sound effects
  • Multiple levels with gently increasing complexity
  • Relaxing and meditative, no time restraints
  • Hidden secrets amongst the hidden objects

name: Ava's Hidden Adventures

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 32-bit Windows
  • Processor: Pentium and above
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 120 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 120 MB RAM
  • Storage: 120 MB available space

short_description: Search for hidden objects in hand-drawn, highly interactive worlds of imagination. Ava's magic pencil makes her drawings come to life! Explore storybook landscapes and discover musical sounds in places most unexpected. Harvest crops, tickle frogs, find faeries, and even trick a goblin king!
